remarks: Lemma for ~ lclkr .  Construct a vector ` B ` that makes the sum of functionals zero.  Combine with ` B e. V ` to shorten overall proof. (Contributed by NM, 17-Jan-2015.)
statement:
lclkrlem2m.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
lclkrlem2m.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
lclkrlem2m.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
lclkrlem2m.q $e |- .X. = ( .r ` S ) $.
lclkrlem2m.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` S ) $.
lclkrlem2m.i $e |- I = ( invr ` S ) $.
lclkrlem2m.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` U ) $.
lclkrlem2m.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` U ) $.
lclkrlem2m.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` U ) $.
lclkrlem2m.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` D ) $.
lclkrlem2m.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
lclkrlem2m.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
lclkrlem2m.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. F ) $.
lclkrlem2m.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
lclkrlem2m.w $e |- ( ph -> U e. LVec ) $.
lclkrlem2m.b $e |- B = ( X .- ( ( ( ( E .+ G ) ` X ) .X. ( I ` ( ( E .+ G ) ` Y ) ) ) .x. Y ) ) $.
lclkrlem2m.n $e |- ( ph -> ( ( E .+ G ) ` Y ) =/= .0. ) $.
lclkrlem2m $p |- ( ph -> ( B e. V /\ ( ( E .+ G ) ` B ) = .0. ) ) $.
